biotools.summary: Drug perturbation gene set enrichment analysis (dpGSEA) can detect phenotypically relevant drug targets through a unique transcriptomic enrichment that emphasizes biological directionality of drug-derived gene sets.

bioschemas.name: dpGSEA
bioschemas.summary: Drug perturbation gene set enrichment analysis (dpGSEA) can detect phenotypically relevant drug targets through a unique transcriptomic enrichment that emphasizes biological directionality of drug-derived gene sets.
